technology.name: Scavenging Runs
technology.description: There is always value in a lightning strike to harvest useful items, whatever they may be.

technology.name: Cadre of Hench-Rats
technology.description: A Warlord’s rule will only ever be as effective as his enforcers allow it to be.

technology.name: Monstrous Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrat unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.name: Monstrous Abominations
technology.description: Born from the fusion of Skaven with a range of horrific creatures, Rat Ogres are bereft of reason and almost devoid of sanity.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Rat Ogres units
Charge bonus: +10 for Rat Ogres units

technology.name: Twisted Beyond Recognition
technology.description: A misshapen mountain of flesh and muscle, with mechanical parts grafted on. Very nasty.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Hell Pit Abomination units
Weapon strength: +10% for Hell Pit Abomination units

technology.name: Unfathomable Horrors
technology.description: A host of holy horrors to direct our aimless dance.

effects.description: Adds a Hell Pit Abomination unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Recruit rank: +2 for Rat Ogres and Hell Pit Abomination units
Speed: +10% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
Enable recruitment: Anointed Plague Monks units

technology.name: Ferocious Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technology.name: Driven by Hunger
technology.description: Lack of food can be a great motivator.

technology.name: Strength in Numbers
technology.description: Large numbers of ill-trained, ill-equipped warriors can still perform a useful function.

technology.name: Take Everything!
technology.description: Yes-yes, take all of it! Yes, all - we can split-divide the spoils later- trust me, yes-yes!

technology.name: The Menace Below
technology.description: We are the Children of the Horned Rat, survivors all and as we were here before you, so shall we be present to see you fall.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 when laying siege or encircling

technology.name: Practiced Goaders
technology.description: "Treat ‘em mean, keep ‘em keen!"

technology.name: Promoted on Merit
technology.description: Those who display a willingness to betray their own, and just the right amount of vicious savagery, find themselves progressing within the Skaven hierarchy.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Warlock Engineers
Ammunition: +20% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units

technology.name: They Can't Blame Their Tools
technology.description: Bad workmen are the same the world over…

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Plagueclaw Catapult, Doom-Flayers, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
Weapon strength: +10% for Doomwheel and Doom-Flayers units
Missile strength: +10% for Plague Claw Catapults, Warp Lightning Cannons and Doomwheel units
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Missile resistance: 20% for Plague Monks and Plague Claw Catapult units

technology.name: Always More Besides
technology.description: Casualties mean little when your population literally breed like rats.

technology.name: Numbers Beyond Counting
technology.description: The tide of monstrous rats flowed over them one by one, dragging them down to be torn apart…

technology.name: Volatile Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrat unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.name: Ensure Product Quality
technology.description: It's always best to test a new concoction before unleashing it on the enemy.

effects.description: Range: +10% for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Warplock Jezzails, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units
Missile strength: +10% for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Warplock Jezzails, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units

technology.name: Ingenious Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrat unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.name: Requisition Protective Gear
technology.description: Masks and armoured suits are useful, not just for protecting Skaven from the enemy, but also from their own crazy contraptions...

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Plague Monks units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Plague Claw Catapult units

technology.name: Murder Dissenters
technology.description: Woe betide any who raise their voices to decry, or even question, the decisions of their betters.

technology.name: Enormous Caches
technology.description: A wise warlord stockpiles ammunition long before it is needed.

effects.description: Adds an extra Plagueclaw Catapult unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Upkeep: -5% for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Warplock Jezzails, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units
Ammunition: +25% for infantry, Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Warplock Jezzails, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units

technology.name: Reject Poor Recruits
technology.description: It’s hard to imagine, but there are some among this most venal, treacherous race who don't quite make the grade or indeed live much longer…

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Warplock Jezzails, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units

technology.name: Secrets of the Book of Woe

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15% for Lore of Plague spells
Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
Physical resistance: 10% for Plague Monks and Plague Claw Catapult units

technology.name: Ruthless Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technology.name: Harsh Production Quotas
technology.description: It means nothing if Skavenslaves die meeting a quota, there will always be more - many more - where they came from.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -5% for Skavenslaves and Clanrats units

technology.name: Set Examples
technology.description: If you want something done right, it's best to publicly kill the one who did it wrong so the others learn.

technology.name: Carve Undertunnels
technology.description: Their vast network of underground tunnels enable the Skaven to move around the world largely undetected.

technology.name: Record Effective Recipes
technology.description: All the screams, the contortions, the howls of agony don't mean much unless the end result is useable and, more importantly, repeatable.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Plague Priests

technology.name: Plans Within Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to its ultimate conclusion.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrat unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.name: Ultimate Experiments
technology.description: Selective breeding and genetic manipulation will breed the strongest Skaven yet.

effects.description: Replaces all Clanrat units spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building with Stormvermin
Hero recruit rank: +5 for Plague Priests

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description: Enable Plague (damage over time) contact effect for Plague Claw Catapult units (Contaminated still applies on explosion)

technology.name: Know Your Place!
technology.description: Needless to say, any Clanrats with ideas above their stations are quickly, and permanently, silenced.

technology.name: Hallucinogenics
technology.description: To make the foe see, hear and smell something else entirely, and then exploit their confusion - that's war taken to the next level.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Plague Monks units

technology.name: Masters of Infiltration
technology.description: It's easier to influence matters when many above ground don't believe you exist...

technology.name: New Warpstone Uses
technology.description: Skaven covet Warpstone above all else; the ability to mutate weeds out the weak and strengthens those who are already strong.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +25% for armies
	(own armies factionwide in owned territory)
Speed: +25% for Plague Monks and Plague Claw Catapult units

technology.name: Hit & Run
technology.description: We-us get in there and kill-slay until they're mostly all dead, then we get out again - let second wave mop up, yes-yes!

technology.name: Eyes Everywhere
technology.description: There is nowhere to hide, nowhere safe to conspire, that isn't watched by agents of the Council.

technology.name: Virulent Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrat unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.name: Distil Poisons
technology.description: A little more nightshade, a little less mandrake… good-perfect, Lizard-things won't stand a chance, yes-yes!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Plague Monks units
Speed: +10% for Plague Monks and Plague Claw Catapult units

technology.name: Spread Rot & Decay
technology.description: No corruption too great, no disease too foul; if the Skaven want territory above-ground they will stop at nothing to acquire it.

effects.description: Adds an extra Plague Monk unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Physical resistance: 5% for Plague Monks and Plague Claw Catapult units

technology.name: Best of the Best
technology.description: The small number who survive the vigorous selection process are well equipped and given a share of the spoils to ensure their future loyalty.

effects.description: Adds a Doomwheel unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Recruit rank: +2 for Stormvermin and Death Runners units

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero
Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description: Passive ability: "Plague of Undeath" for Plague Monks and Plague Claw Catapult units

ui_effects.description: Entities cannot die while ability is active

technology.name: Devious Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Skavenslaves units

technology.name: Fight Dirty!
technology.description: Whereby war's notional rulebook is tossed away in favour of unbridled, fiendish savagery.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
Missile strength: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units

technology.name: Abduct Promising Candidates
technology.description: What to do when the agent you require works for another clan, who clearly do not appreciate his talents?

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
Recruitment cost: -10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
Ammunition: +10% to Night Runners and Gutter Runner units

technology.name: Oppressive Plans
technology.description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrat unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.name: Rule Through Fear
technology.description: Fear of being dragged away and killed is another great motivator.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Death Runners units
Charge bonus: +10 for Death Runners units

technology.name: Intensive Training
technology.description: Unsurprisingly, even more shouting, combined with terrible punishments, does tend to yield the desired results.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units

technology.name: Exotic Martial Arts
technology.description: The advanced skills Skaven assassins learn in the Far East appear quite alien, but are no less effective when practised at home.

technology.name: Exploit Criminals
technology.description: It's difficult to imagine the Skaven concept of malfeasance, but it must exist; ‘criminals’ are put to work, as an alternative to an agonising death.

technology.name: Eliminate the Competition
technology.description: There is always high demand for assassins willing to murder for someone who needs to keep their own hands clean.

effects.description:
Assassinate action: Additional 10% success chance
	(all characters factionwide)

technology.name: Ensure Absolute Loyalty
technology.description: If you wish to survive the turbulent, cutthroat world of Skaven politics you need loyal warriors on your side.

effects.description: Control: -2 in enemy provinces where an army is present
Recruitment cost: -25% for Plague Monks and Plagueclaw Catapult units
